name: invio
tagline: A self-hosted URL shortener and branded link management service
description: Invio is a self hosted URL shortener and branded link management service. It generates short links, tracks clicks and referrers, and provides a minimal dashboard so teams can manage campaigns without relying on third party link platforms.

features.title: SMTP Integration
features.description: Connects to SMTP servers for email delivery

features.title: Email Templates
features.description: Manages reusable templates for consistent emails

features.title: Delivery Tracking
features.description: Records sent messages and delivery status

features.title: Web Dashboard
features.description: Manages configuration and email activity in a browser

features.title: Asynchronous Delivery
features.description: Processes email sending in background queues

features.title: Self-Hosted Email Service
features.description: Runs the service on your own servers
